step.datasource:
UPDATE n WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET abei_rowstatus = 10 -- skip update because date is the same , abei_message = 'Skipped, date is up to date' , sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM [dbo].[_AB_tb_ExtendedWarranty_ItemNumbers] n WHERE 1=1 AND n.abei_rowstatus = 1 AND n.abei_runid = '%runid%' AND ISNULL(n.DateEnd, '2020-01-01') = ISNULL(n.DateEnd_old, '2020-01-01');
UPDATE n WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET abei_rowstatus = 1 -- retry , abei_runid = '%runid%' , abei_retrycount = n.abei_retrycount+1 , sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM [dbo].[_AB_tb_ExtendedWarranty_ItemNumbers] n WHERE 1=1 AND n.abei_rowstatus = -1 AND n.abei_retrycount < 4 -- max x times

SELECT ID, DateEnd, LotNumber , tID as referencekey FROM [dbo].[_AB_tb_ExtendedWarranty_ItemNumbers] n WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND n.abei_rowstatus = 1 AND n.abei_runid = '%runid%' AND n.administration = '%abeitargetdb%'

UPDATE n WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET abei_rowstatus = ISNULL(r.rowstatus, -1) , abei_message = ISNULL(r.errormessage, 'No result found') , sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM [%abeitargetdb%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ExtendedWarranty_ItemNumbers] n LEFT JOIN [ABEI].[dbo].[_AB_Entity_results] AS r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.runid = n.abei_runid AND r.jobid = '%jobid%' AND r.Entity = 'ItemNumber' AND r.TargetDB = n.administration AND r.ReferenceValue = CAST(n.tID as varchar(100)) WHERE 1=1 AND n.abei_rowstatus = 1 AND n.abei_runid = '%runid%' AND n.administration = '%abeisourcedb%'

SELECT ID, DateEnd, LotNumber , tID as referencekey FROM [dbo].[_AB_tb_ExtendedWarranty_ItemNumbers] n WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND n.abei_rowstatus = 1 AND n.abei_runid = '%runid%' AND n.administration = '%abeitargetdb%'

UPDATE n WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET abei_rowstatus = ISNULL(r.rowstatus, -1) , abei_message = ISNULL(r.errormessage, 'No result found') , sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM [%abeitargetdb%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ExtendedWarranty_ItemNumbers] n LEFT JOIN [ABEI].[dbo].[_AB_Entity_results] AS r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.runid = n.abei_runid AND r.jobid = '%jobid%' AND r.Entity = 'ItemNumber' AND r.TargetDB = n.administration AND r.ReferenceValue = CAST(n.tID as varchar(100)) WHERE 1=1 AND n.abei_rowstatus = 1 AND n.abei_runid = '%runid%' AND n.administration = '%abeisourcedb%'

SELECT ID, DateEnd, LotNumber , tID as referencekey FROM [dbo].[_AB_tb_ExtendedWarranty_ItemNumbers] n WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND n.abei_rowstatus = 1 AND n.abei_runid = '%runid%' AND n.administration = '%abeitargetdb%'

UPDATE n WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET abei_rowstatus = ISNULL(r.rowstatus, -1) , abei_message = ISNULL(r.errormessage, 'No result found') , sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM [%abeitargetdb%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ExtendedWarranty_ItemNumbers] n LEFT JOIN [ABEI].[dbo].[_AB_Entity_results] AS r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.runid = n.abei_runid AND r.jobid = '%jobid%' AND r.Entity = 'ItemNumber' AND r.TargetDB = n.administration AND r.ReferenceValue = CAST(n.tID as varchar(100)) WHERE 1=1 AND n.abei_rowstatus = 1 AND n.abei_runid = '%runid%' AND n.administration = '%abeisourcedb%'

SELECT ID, DateEnd, LotNumber , tID as referencekey FROM [dbo].[_AB_tb_ExtendedWarranty_ItemNumbers] n WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND n.abei_rowstatus = 1 AND n.abei_runid = '%runid%' AND n.administration = '%abeitargetdb%'

UPDATE n WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET abei_rowstatus = ISNULL(r.rowstatus, -1) , abei_message = ISNULL(r.errormessage, 'No result found') , sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM [%abeitargetdb%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ExtendedWarranty_ItemNumbers] n LEFT JOIN [ABEI].[dbo].[_AB_Entity_results] AS r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.runid = n.abei_runid AND r.jobid = '%jobid%' AND r.Entity = 'ItemNumber' AND r.TargetDB = n.administration AND r.ReferenceValue = CAST(n.tID as varchar(100)) WHERE 1=1 AND n.abei_rowstatus = 1 AND n.abei_runid = '%runid%' AND n.administration = '%abeisourcedb%'

select i.id, i.ItemCode, i.Number, ii.DateEnd, ii.LotNumber from [400]..itemnumbers i with (nolock) inner join [483]..itemnumbers ii with (nolock) on ii.Number = i.Number where i.DateEnd is not null and ii.DateEnd is not null and DATEDIFF(dd,i.DateEnd, ii.DateEnd) > 1

SELECT n.administration, n.ordernr, n.debnr, n.regel, n.artcode, n.oms45, n.afldat, n.warranty_artcode, n.DateEnd, n.abei_message, n.abei_checkmessage FROM dbo._AB_tb_ExtendedWarranty_ItemNumbers n WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND n.syscreated >= CAST(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as date) AND n.abei_runid = '%runid%' AND (n.abei_rowstatus = -1 -- Error OR (n.abei_rowstatus = 10 AND n.abei_message NOT LIKE 'Skipped%') OR (ISNULL(n.abei_checkmessage, '') != '') ) ORDER BY n.administration, n.ordernr, n.regel, n.tID
step.contentbody:
Hallo,

Onderstaande meldingen zijn voorgekomen tijdens het berekenen van de Extended Warranty.

Graag de orders controleren.






administrationordernrdebnrregelartcodeoms45afldatwarranty_artcodeDateEndabei_messageabei_checkmessage
%administration%%ordernr%%debnr%%regel%%artcode%%oms45%%afldat%%warranty_artcode%%DateEnd%%abei_message%%abei_checkmessage%
 

Deze mail is automatisch gegenereerd door ABEI om %abeinow%
